remarks: Remove dependency on ~ ax-ext , ~ df-clab and ~ df-cleq (and ~ df-sb and ~ df-v ) from ~ vtoclf .  (Contributed by BJ, 6-Oct-2019.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)
statement:
bj-vtoclf.nf $e |- F/ x ps $.
bj-vtoclf.s $e |- A e. V $.
bj-vtoclf.maj $e |- ( x = A -> ( ph <-> ps ) ) $.
bj-vtoclf.min $e |- ph $.
bj-vtoclf $p |- ps $.
$d A x $.
$d V x $.
